with some really sweet cherry tomatoes

alright item 11 was a chicken Ballentine

let it rest and sliced it so delicious
and what made it even more incredible I
did a little reduction of chicken stock
with some Dijon mustard and cream really
really nice so that's a chicken
Ballentine and I will demo that one of

item 12 duck confit one of my favorite
